text: So are we all supposed to stand by while Pence lies that Oklahoma’s virus cases are flattening & Trump gets ready to put tens of thousands of Americans in danger to feed his sick ego? If we know the kool-aid is poisoned, do we just watch as they head to the punch bowl & drink?
